title: Rope a Dupe - Additional Prices Listed
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: Rope a Dupe - Additional Prices Listed
posts.post_content:
I've added a few prices to my duplicate page on collector focus so take a look at

\[url]www.collectorfocus.com/collection/frankbmd/duplicates[/url]


A few of the cards may not be available for various reasons, but if you care to ask about an unpriced card or two fell free to inquire.

The prices listed include shipping.  If you don;t like the price, suggest an alternative.

What better time to rope a dupe for your collection.
I will gladly take the Leifield brown Hindu. Is there a price on the Jones brown Hindu ?

Personal Message sent to you Frank.
                      Sincerely,  Dennis

More pricing added.;)

Take a gander, but not my Gandil.:eek:
